Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Riverdell Way, west of Oolan's Armory.
Room.LongDescription: Oolan's Armory is like every other armory in town, but specializes in exotic leather items such as dragon's leather and shark leather. The fancy leathers are not without a cost, though, and they seldom last much longer than standard leather armors, if even that long. They do make a good fashion statement, though, and occasionally Oolan has some really durable stuff.
